thread.title: VIDEO: Ranveer Singh & Alia Bhatt Are Going Crazy!
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Ranveer Singh & Alia Bhatt Are Going Crazy!

author: Priyam Saha
title: VIDEO: Ranveer Singh & Alia Bhatt Are Going Crazy!
text:
Priyam Saha Feb . 27 . 2017 Ranveer Singh 
If there’s one Bollywood actor who goes out of his way to promote his fellow actors’ films, it’s Ranveer Singh . From the epic Bang Bang Dare to his more recent video for Rustom , our man always goes all out. 
Ranveer and Alia Bhatt are doing Zoya Akhtar ‘s Gully Boys soon. Varun Dhawan and Ranveer also share a friendship. So it makes perfect sense that Ranveer has contributed to Badrinath Ki Dulhania promotions. 
Why is he a sardar in it though? Was Ranveer shooting for something or is this just Ranveer being Ranveer? :P 
— Ranveer Singh (@RanveerOfficial) February 26, 2017 
Love this!
